info.title: osrsbox-api
info.description: An open, free, complete and up-to-date RESTful API for Old School RuneScape (OSRS) items, monsters and prayers.

last_updated.description: The last time (UTC) the item was updated (in ISO8601 date format).

incomplete.description: If the item has incomplete wiki data.

members.description: If the item is a members-only.

tradeable.description: If the item is tradeable (between players and on the GE).

tradeable_on_ge.description: If the item is tradeable (only on GE).

stackable.description: If the item is stackable (in inventory).

stacked.description: If the item is stacked, indicated by the stack count.

linked_id_item.description: The linked ID of the actual item (if noted/placeholder).

linked_id_noted.description: The linked ID of an item in noted form.

linked_id_placeholder.description: The linked ID of an item in placeholder form.

placeholder.description: If the item is a placeholder.

equipable.description: If the item is equipable (based on right-click menu entry).

equipable_by_player.description: If the item is equipable in-game by a player.

equipable_weapon.description: If the item is an equipable weapon.

cost.description: The store price of an item.

lowalch.description: The low alchemy value of the item (cost * 0.4).

highalch.description: The high alchemy value of the item (cost * 0.6).

weight.description: The weight (in kilograms) of the item.

buy_limit.description: The Grand Exchange buy limit of the item.

quest_item.description: If the item is associated with a quest.

release_date.description: Date the item was released (in ISO8601 format).

duplicate.description: If the item is a duplicate.

examine.description: The examine text for the item.

wiki_name.description: The OSRS Wiki name for the item.

wiki_url.description: The OSRS Wiki URL (possibly including anchor link).

equipment.description: The equipment bonuses of equipable armour/weapons.

attack_stab.description: The attack stab bonus of the item.

attack_slash.description: The attack slash bonus of the item.

attack_crush.description: The attack crush bonus of the item.

attack_magic.description: The attack magic bonus of the item.

attack_ranged.description: The attack ranged bonus of the item.

defence_stab.description: The defence stab bonus of the item.

defence_slash.description: The defence slash bonus of the item.

defence_crush.description: The defence crush bonus of the item.

defence_magic.description: The defence magic bonus of the item.

defence_ranged.description: The defence ranged bonus of the item.

melee_strength.description: The melee strength bonus of the item.

ranged_strength.description: The ranged strength bonus of the item.

magic_damage.description: The magic damage bonus of the item.

prayer.description: The prayer bonus of the item.

slot.description: The equipment slot associated with the item (e.g., head).

weapon.description: The weapon bonuses including attack speed, type and stance.

attack_speed.description: The attack speed of a weapon (in game ticks).

stances.description: An array of weapon stance information.

stances.description: An array of weapon stance information.

last_updated.description: The last time (UTC) the monster was updated (in ISO8601 date format).

incomplete.description: If the monster has incomplete wiki data.

members.description: If the monster is members only, or not.

release_date.description: The release date of the monster (in ISO8601 date format).

combat_level.description: The combat level of the monster.

size.description: The size, in tiles, of the monster.

hitpoints.description: The number of hitpoints a monster has.

max_hit.description: The maximum hit of the monster.

attack_type.description: The attack style (e.g., melee, magic, range) of the monster.

attack_speed.description: The attack speed (in game ticks) of the monster.

aggressive.description: If the monster is aggressive, or not.

poisonous.description: If the monster poisons, or not

venomous.description: If the monster poisons using venom, or not

immune_poison.description: If the monster is immune to poison, or not

immune_venom.description: If the monster is immune to venom, or not

slayer_monster.description: If the monster is a potential slayer task.

slayer_level.description: The slayer level required to kill the monster.

slayer_xp.description: The slayer XP rewarded for a monster kill.

slayer_masters.description: The slayer masters who can assign the monster.

duplicate.description: If the monster is a duplicate.

examine.description: The examine text of the monster.

wiki_name.description: The OSRS Wiki name for the monster.

wiki_url.description: The OSRS Wiki URL (possibly including anchor link).

attack_level.description: The attack level of the monster.

strength_level.description: The strength level of the monster.

defence_level.description: The defence level of the monster.

magic_level.description: The magic level of the monster.

ranged_level.description: The ranged level of the monster.

attack_bonus.description: The attack bonus of the monster.

strength_bonus.description: The strength bonus of the monster.

attack_magic.description: The magic attack of the monster.

magic_bonus.description: The magic bonus of the monster.

attack_ranged.description: The ranged attack of the monster.

ranged_bonus.description: The ranged bonus of the monster.

defence_stab.description: The defence stab bonus of the monster.

defence_slash.description: The defence slash bonus of the monster.

defence_crush.description: The defence crush bonus of the monster.

defence_magic.description: The defence magic bonus of the monster.

defence_ranged.description: The defence ranged bonus of the monster.

drops.description: An array of monster drop objects.

id.description: The ID number of the item drop.

name.description: The name of the item drop.

members.description: If the drop is a members-only item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item drop (integer, comma-separated or range).

noted.description: If the item drop is noted, or not.

rarity.description: The rarity of the item drop (as a float out of 1.0).

rolls.description: Number of rolls from the drop.

drain_per_minute.description: The prayer point drain rate per minute.

requirements.description: The stat requirements to use the prayer.

icon.description: The icon image (in base64 encoding) of the item.
The icon image (in base64 encoding) of the prayer.

Item.description: An example for Item documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Weapon.description: An example for Weapon documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Equipment.description: An example for Equipment documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Monster.description: An example for Monster documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Prayer.description: An example for Prayer documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Icons_item.description: An example for Icons_item documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Icons_prayer.description: An example for Icons_prayer documents request bodies. Used in POST, PUT, PATCH methods.

Item.description: A Item or list of Item documents

Weapon.description: A Weapon or list of Weapon documents

Equipment.description: A Equipment or list of Equipment documents

Monster.description: A Monster or list of Monster documents

Prayer.description: A Prayer or list of Prayer documents

Icons_item.description: A Icons_item or list of Icons_item documents

Icons_prayer.description: A Icons_prayer or list of Icons_prayer documents
